name: The Groceries - Refilled
description:
The Groceries - Refilled
(Pursuing Pixels James Jam Game Gam)

Developed by 3 small game developers attending a game development course in Finland.

Idea

"The Groceries - Refilled" is about repeating an ordinary and mundane daily task as a grocery store employee. Fill shelves and try to keep them at 100% at all times, if they reach 0% you won't be able to refill the shelves anymore.

Gameplay

Take boxes from the storage room (walk into  the yellow zone right behind you in the storage room to access the menu) filled with everyday stuff from the grocery shop and take them to their designated aisles, then fill the dark-gray colored shelves.  Filling the shelves takes 4 seconds so make sure you are as fast as you can be. If you happened to choose the wrong box from the storage room shelves, you can always just replace them (by throwing them into the white trash bin in the storage room)!

Controls

W, A, S, D - Move

Left Shift - Run

LMB - Interact with UI

You can quit the game by walking into the door on the right wall.




Known Bugs

If the shelf reaches 0% while you're refilling it your character won't be able to move, in this case ALT+F4 out of the game.
